Name: Galatean League
Description: The Galatean League emerged as a formal entity on December 24, 3144, following the successful defense of Galatea against an invasion by Clan Jade Falcon. Originally a loose coalition of mercenary commands led by Hansen's Roughriders, the League was established to safeguard Galatea and its neighboring worlds from future Clan advances. Envoys from the League extended invitations to Menkent, Mizar, and Syrma, securing the allegiance of Syrma and Mizar in 3145, though Menkent chose to align with the Jade Falcons. Alcor later joined the League as well. Despite Mizar's withdrawal in 3149, the League maintained a protective presence there, highlighting its commitment to regional stability. The Galatean League represents a bastion of independence and mercenary cooperation in the fractured Inner Sphere of the 32nd century.
ReputationStatements: I don't know why we're reaching out to you, to be frank. It's clear you're no ally of the Galatean League, but we're in a difficult position, and desperate times call for desperate measures. Prove me wrong, Commander.
Mercenary Commander, your methods may not align with honor, but they might serve our cause. Complete this mission competently, and we may reconsider our reservations about your company.
The Galatean League sees potential value in your company, Commander. Attached, you'll find the details of a contract. Let's see if we can build a mutually beneficial relationship.
Greetings, Commander. As a respected mercenary leader, you're being offered a key mission that the League believes is suited to your expertise. We hope you'll find the terms fair.
Commander, the Galatean League recognizes your considerable skills. We're presenting this contract in respect of your reputation. Please give it your serious consideration.
Greetings, Commander. This mission is of high importance and not a job we'd entrust to just anyone. Your loyalty and ability have earned our trust, please accept this offer.

Commander, you're a valued ally to the League, as trusted as the soldiers who formed our defenses against the Jade Falcons. We count on you again to ensure the mission's success. The stakes are high, but we know you can deliver.
MissionSuccessStatements: Outstanding work, Commander! Your efforts have reinforced the Galatean League's position and proven your worth. You can be sure this success won't go unnoticed in future contract negotiations.
GoodFaithFailureStatements: Commander, not every battle ends in victory, but the Galatean League values the effort you've put forth. Learn from this defeat and return stronger—we know you're capable.
BadFaithFailureStatements: Commander, your lackluster performance has been a serious disappointment. The League cannot tolerate such ineptitude—improve your methods or don't bother answering future calls for aid.
